data.text: We are now on WhatsApp! Save our number +52 55 5898 8599 and #DropUsAWhatsApp https://t.co/0QSnIRZdN8 https://t.co/yrLthquX2z
There’s still time to plan the perfect summer with this deal ☀️ 😎 Purchase now to save up to 50%: https://t.co/K6Uo8DMIv5 https://t.co/f6KUGCeUg6

Happy Earth Day! At Volaris, we work every day to make sure we can help take care of the planet to the best of our capacity. This is why we have introduced “For a Clean Sky” initiative. Take a look: https://t.co/sN9NM4YRzC #EarthDay2021 https://t.co/B9miUi6kEB

data.text: This deal is only here today! 👀  Take advantage before it flies away ✈️ Save up to 50%: https://t.co/APzYpYgiZZ https://t.co/FOJur3fBYj

Okay we are done now, we are just so excited for our new planes 😍😍😍 
We hope to see you on board soon!
The cabin is also stunning! I mean c’mon. https://t.co/wuGmO7Ht8l
And the new interiors are A M A Z I N G!!! We can’t wait until you guys get to check it out for yourselves. https://t.co/nC3g4e0yPx
How cool is the tail? We are absolutely obsessed with it! https://t.co/TLUR7viCyK

Hi everyone, we have some exciting news 👀 
We have 8 new A320 NEO planes joining our fleet in 2021!!!! We are opening a thread to hype our planes up. https://t.co/P61rGcMc17

We firmly believe that everyone deserves the summer of their dreams 🌊 🏝️ ☀️ 
That’s why we are offering up to 50% off on your summer flights: https://t.co/P8wqr5XFSM https://t.co/psaEB0Hlbh
We'll take you to Costa Rica so you can visit the Rio Celeste Falls! ✈️ https://t.co/IK4nnn0aIG
Do you want the most affordable prices? Follow these steps 🙌🏽 https://t.co/01bx0KIAhB https://t.co/eE3ftXRNIL

Summer is knocking and we are offering flights with up to 30% off 🏝️ ☀️: https://t.co/d4XJeAey37 
What are you waiting for?  😎 https://t.co/hQvnx38QUC

Head out of town with us!!! 💜 ✈️  
Purchase your flight today and save up to 50%: https://t.co/oO0LkO95nV https://t.co/u9jnQeRo8w
